meaningInfo: Imagine the horse and the squid sitting at desks in a big room, scribbling madly on their tests. They're both nervous because this test is really important.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>test</kanji> is being supervised by <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai.
readingInfo: To make sure the horse and the squid don't cheat on the <kanji>test</kanji>, <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai is watching them closely, pacing up and down. Every now and then, he waves his katana menacingly.
